means: hear ： 及物动词，指声音进入耳内，但不含有注意的意味，即，只要听觉正常，声音进入耳内，就能听见。但在祈使句中，hear可指有意识的行为。
listen ： 不及物动词，指有意识地倾听，强调行为的过程。
overhear ： 指偶然听到，无意中听到，也指偷听。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"偷听，窃听"之意。
means: overhear ： 多指在别人不注意或不知道的情况下偶然听到谈话的内容。
bug ： 指在室内等处安装窃听器以窃听他人的谈话内容。
monitor ： 通常指用仪器设备偷听别人的谈话内容。

sentence.Network_en: They were shut away in a little room where nobody could overhear.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们被关在一个小屋里，没人能听到他们的动静。

sentence.Network_en: The door is shut so that no one may overhear what is said.
sentence.Network_cn: 门关着，这样没人能听见说话的内容。

sentence.Network_en: They stepped aside so that their child could not overhear their conversation.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们走到一边去,不让孩子听见他们的谈话.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 第29届香港电影金像奖_百度百科 ... 4.新宿事件 Shinjuku Incident 5.窃听风云（overhear） Overheard 2.大江东去 River Of No Return.
自己总结不定词--过去式--过去分词 - 豆丁网 ... overhung 悬于…之上 overhear 无意中听到；偷听 overheard 串音.
普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... overhead 高架的 overhear 无意中听到 overland 经陆路的.
PETS3_资料内容_资料下载_学习资料共享网 ... overhead 在头顶上(的) overhear 偶然听到，从旁听到 overseas 外国的，海外的.

list.abs: Pay attention to overhear our talk !, 注意 , 有人在偷听咱们的谈话!
Gust could not overhear what passed between them ., 阵风什么不能偷听通过它们之间.
you overhear two young farmers talking about a Heroic Adventurer who is leading a peasant revolt !您偷听二位年轻农夫谈论带领农民起义的一个英勇冒险家！
You might even overhear some office gossip , but try not get into office politics ., 你或许还会无意中听到一些办公室的闲言碎语 , 请努力要不让自己卷入办公室政治.

means.word_mean: 无意中听到,偶然听到,偷听

entry.tran: 偶然听到；无意中听到；偷听到
entry.def: If you overhear someone, you hear what they are saying when they are not talking to you and they do not know that you are listening.

example.ex: I overheard two doctors discussing my case.
example.tran: 我无意中听到两位医生讨论我的病情。

means.word_mean: 1. hear, usually without the knowledge of the speakers;

sentences.sentence: "We overheard the conversation at the next table"

auth_sentence.content: He added, If I overhear you tell a Wop joke .
auth_sentence.res_content: He added, If I overhear you tell a Wop joke .
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He added, If I overhear you tell a Wop joke .

auth_sentence.content: You also have to put yourself in a position to overhear things.
auth_sentence.res_content: You also have to put yourself in a position to overhear things.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You also have to put yourself in a position to overhear things.

auth_sentence.content: Truths and half-truths drifted like shadows into conversations he was not intended to overhear.
auth_sentence.res_content: Truths and half-truths drifted like shadows into conversations he was not intended to overhear.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Truths and half-truths drifted like shadows into conversations he was not intended to overhear.

sentences.en: I overheard some cruel remarks about my husband.
sentences.cn: 我无意中听到一些议论我丈夫的粗鲁话。

sentences.en: I overheard them say they were dissatisfied.
sentences.cn: 我偶然听到他们说, 他们不满意。
他们无意中听到她唱歌。

jushi.english: I wouldn't like to be overheard.
Let's go and overhear them carefully.
jushi.chinese: 让咱们去仔细地偷听他们谈话。

jushi.english: I was too far away to overhear their conversation.
jushi.chinese: 我离得太远了,听不见他们说什么。
